tool.name: Select first

param.name: count
param.label: Number of lines
param.help: These will be kept/discarded depending on 'operation'. (--lines)

tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool outputs specified number of lines from the **beginning** of a dataset
-----
**Example**
Selecting 2 lines from this::
chr7 56632 56652 D17003_CTCF_R6 310 + chr7 56736 56756 D17003_CTCF_R7 354 + chr7 56761 56781 D17003_CTCF_R4 220 + chr7 56772 56792 D17003_CTCF_R7 372 + chr7 56775 56795 D17003_CTCF_R4 207 +
will produce::
chr7 56632 56652 D17003_CTCF_R6 310 + chr7 56736 56756 D17003_CTCF_R7 354 +
@REFERENCES@
